cause.description:
THIS WAR WILL LEAD TO NOTHING IS THAT WHAT WE EXPECT FROM FATEH ? IS THAT WHAT WE EXPECT FROM HAMAS ? IS THAT WHAT BOTH FATEH AND HAMAS PROMISED TO ACHIEVE?
WE NEED TO STOP IT
1. THE FIGHTING SHOULD STOP
2. UNITE FATEH AND HAMAS
3. SOLIDIFY PEACE BETWEEN ALL PALESTINIANS
cause.mission: STOP THE FITNA BETWEEN HAMAS AND FATEH
cause.name: STOP THE WAR IN PALESTINE
